page.title: 12 My house by Gary
page.content: Our house is 20 years old. Spexhall means the hole of the woodpecker. In our garden we have 4 apple trees and 2 pear trees. We also have 6 fir trees and 12 rose trees. In our house we have 2 bedrooms, 1 living room, 1 bathroom, 1 kitchen and 1 hall. We have one snooker table, a stacking music centre and an ordinary music centre. We also have 1 trainset, a portable television, a colour television and a video. When our house vwas built it was named after Angus Wilkinson. His grandad built our house and named it Angus Lodge.
